title: Episode 712 - DB Sports Companion Show - Special Guest Former Dodgers Catcher Paul Lo Duca
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Paul Lo Duca and Blackjack Fletcher to predict this week's NFL and College game spreads, as well as answer the burning question of whether or not Mike Piazza really did get pegged in our first episode...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Paul Lo Duca and Blackjack Fletcher to predict this week's NFL and College game spreads, as well as answer the burning question of whether or not Mike Piazza really did get pegged in our first episode.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Paul Lo Duca and Blackjack Fletcher to predict this week's NFL and College game spreads, as well as answer the burning question of whether or not Mike Piazza really did get pegged in our first episode.

content:encoded:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Paul Lo Duca and Blackjack Fletcher to predict this week's NFL and College game spreads, as well as answer the burning question of whether or not Mike Piazza really did get pegged in our first episode.
